meanings.definition: A person who places an order.
meanings.sent1: The orderers at the restaurant were busy choosing their meals.
meanings.sent2: The online store received a lot of orders from various orderers.
meanings.sent3: The orderers at the drive-thru seemed to be in a hurry to get their food.
meanings.sent4: The orderers in the queue resembled ants marching in a line.
meanings.sent5: The orderers' excitement was palpable as they awaited their packages.

meanings.sent1: The orderers gathered to discuss their preferences for the upcoming event.
meanings.sent2: The orderers' names were listed on the board for easy reference.
meanings.sent3: The orderers in the group all wore matching hats for fun.
meanings.sent4: The orderers stood out in the crowd with their colorful outfits.
meanings.sent5: The orderers' voices blended harmoniously during the meeting.
